ingles: The book of the history of Jesus Christ, son of David, son of Abraham:
portugues: O livro da história de Jesus Cristo, filho de Davi, filho de Abraão:

ingles: Abraham became father to Isaac; Isaac became father to Jacob; Jacob became father to Judah and his brothers;
portugues: Abraão tornou-se pai de Isaque; Isaque tornou-se pai de Jacó; Jacó tornou-se pai de Judá e de seus irmãos;

ingles: Judah became father to Perez and Zerah by Tamar; Perez became father to Hezron; Hezron became father to Ram;
portugues: Judá tornou-se pai de Peres e de Zerá por meio de Tamar; Peres tornou-se pai de Esrom; Esrom tornou-se pai de Rão;

ingles: Ram became father to Amminadab; Amminadab became father to Nahshon; Nahshon became father to Salmon;
portugues: Rão tornou-se pai de Aminadabe; Aminadabe tornou-se pai de Nasom; Nasom tornou-se pai de Salmom;

ingles: Salmon became father to Boaz by Rahab; Boaz became father to Obed by Ruth; Obed became father to Jesse;
portugues: Salmom tornou-se pai de Boaz por meio de Raabe; Boaz tornou-se pai de Obede por meio de Rute; Obede tornou-se pai de Jessé;

ingles: Jesse became father to David the king. David became father to Solomon by the wife of Uriah;
portugues: Jessé tornou-se pai de Davi, o rei. Davi tornou-se pai de Salomão por meio da esposa de Urias;

ingles: Solomon became father to Rehoboam; Rehoboam became father to Abijah; Abijah became father to Asa;
portugues: Salomão tornou-se pai de Roboão; Roboão tornou-se pai de Abias; Abias tornou-se pai de Asa;

ingles: Asa became father to Jehoshaphat; Jehoshaphat became father to Jehoram; Jehoram became father to Uzziah;
portugues: Asa tornou-se pai de Jeosafá; Jeosafá tornou-se pai de Jeorão; Jeorão tornou-se pai de Uzias;

ingles: Uzziah became father to Jotham; Jotham became father to Ahaz; Ahaz became father to Hezekiah;
portugues: Uzias tornou-se pai de Jotão; Jotão tornou-se pai de Acaz; Acaz tornou-se pai de Ezequias;

ingles: Hezekiah became father to Manasseh; Manasseh became father to Amon; Amon became father to Josiah;
portugues: Ezequias tornou-se pai de Manassés; Manassés tornou-se pai de Amom; Amom tornou-se pai de Josias;

ingles: Josiah became father to Jeconiah and to his brothers at the time of the deportation to Babylon.
portugues: Josias tornou-se pai de Jeconias e de seus irmãos, na época da deportação para Babilônia.

ingles: After the deportation to Babylon, Jeconiah became father to Shealtiel; Shealtiel became father to Zerubbabel;
portugues: Depois da deportação para Babilônia, Jeconias tornou-se pai de Sealtiel; Sealtiel tornou-se pai de Zorobabel;

ingles: Zerubbabel became father to Abiud; Abiud became father to Eliakim; Eliakim became father to Azor;
portugues: Zorobabel tornou-se pai de Abiúde; Abiúde tornou-se pai de Eliaquim; Eliaquim tornou-se pai de Azor;

ingles: Azor became father to Zadok; Zadok became father to Achim; Achim became father to Eliud;
portugues: Azor tornou-se pai de Sadoque; Sadoque tornou-se pai de Aquim; Aquim tornou-se pai de Eliúde;

ingles: Eliud became father to Eleazar; Eleazar became father to Matthan; Matthan became father to Jacob;
portugues: Eliúde tornou-se pai de Eleazar; Eleazar tornou-se pai de Matã; Matã tornou-se pai de Jacó;

ingles: Jacob became father to Joseph the husband of Mary, of whom Jesus was born, who is called Christ.
portugues: Jacó tornou-se pai de José, marido de Maria, da qual nasceu Jesus, que é chamado Cristo.

ingles: All the generations, then, from Abraham until David were
portugues: Assim, todas as gerações, desde Abraão até Davi, foram

ingles: generations; from David until the deportation to Babylon,
portugues: gerações; desde Davi até a deportação para Babilônia,

ingles: generations; from the deportation to Babylon until the Christ,
portugues: gerações; desde a deportação para Babilônia até o Cristo,

ingles: generations.
portugues: gerações.

ingles: But this is how the birth of Jesus Christ took place. During the time his mother Mary was promised in marriage to Joseph, she was found to be pregnant by holy spirit before they were united.
portugues: Foi assim que o nascimento de Jesus Cristo aconteceu: durante o tempo em que sua mãe, Maria, estava prometida em casamento a José, ela ficou grávida por espírito santo, antes de se unirem.

ingles: However, because her husband Joseph was righteous and did not want to make her a public spectacle, he intended to divorce her secretly.
portugues: No entanto, visto que José, seu marido, era justo e não queria expô-la publicamente, ele pretendia se divorciar dela em segredo.

ingles: But after he had thought these things over, look! Jehovah's angel appeared to him in a dream, saying: "Joseph, son of David, do not be afraid to take your wife Mary home, for what has been conceived in her is by holy spirit.
portugues: Mas, depois de ter cogitado essas coisas, o anjo de Jeová apareceu-lhe num sonho, dizendo: "José, filho de Davi, não tenha medo de levar para casa Maria, sua esposa, pois o que foi concebido nela é por espírito santo.

ingles: She will give birth to a son, and you are to name him Jesus, for he will save his people from their sins."
portugues: Ela dará à luz um filho, e você deve lhe dar o nome de Jesus, pois ele salvará seu povo dos pecados deles."

ingles: All of this actually came about to fulfill what was spoken by Jehovah through his prophet, saying:
portugues: Tudo isso aconteceu realmente para cumprir o que Jeová tinha dito por meio do seu profeta:

ingles: "Look! The virgin will become pregnant and will give birth to a son, and they will name him Immanuel," which means, when translated, "With Us Is God."
portugues: "Vejam! A virgem ficará grávida e dará à luz um filho, e lhe darão o nome de Emanuel", que traduzido quer dizer "Deus está conosco".

ingles: Then Joseph woke up from his sleep and did as the angel of Jehovah had directed him, and he took his wife home.
portugues: José acordou então do sono e fez conforme o anjo de Jeová lhe havia orientado, e levou sua esposa para casa.

ingles: But he did not have sexual relations with her until she gave birth to a son, and he named him Jesus.
portugues: Mas não teve relações com ela até ela dar à luz um filho, e ele lhe deu o nome de Jesus.
